alert.note: Alert for Houston; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 8:12PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Twiggs and northeastern Houston Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 811 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was centered near Bullard, or 11 miles west of Jeffersonville. Another strong storm was centered 3 miles southweest of Warner Robins. Both storms were moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jeffersonville, Warner Robins, Centerville, Robins AFB, Marion, Tarversville, District Path, Robins Air Force Base, Bullard, Bonaire and Kathleen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
